fields.description: Tax Authority ID.  This is the Tax Authority unique identifier

Tax Authority Reference ID. The Tax Authority Reference ID can be used to uniquely identify a Tax Authority.  Unlike Tax Authority ID, Workday will not automatically generate a Tax Authority Reference ID if one is not received.  The recommended use for Tax Authority ID is where Workday is not the source system of the Tax Authority.

Business Entity Name is the name for the business entity.  Business entities can not be duplicated across different business entity types, ie: a Customer can not have the same name as a Financial Institution unless they share the Business Entity.
Business Entity Furigana
